name: Elektra
description: Assassin and mercenary Elektra Natchios was trained by the ancient cult of ninjas known as The Hand to be a supreme martial artist and master of stealth. She is willing to work for anyone who can afford her matchless skills, bringing a swift end to those who dare stand in her way. While she sometimes joins forces with Daredevil and other heroes, she is ultimately a lone warrior who follows her own path among the shadows.
